replies.author: 天空Craft
replies.txt_content:
Orange-Xo 发表于 2020-7-22 14:31
呃，大佬，指令是啥
/shopkeepers
给个最佳哦~

replies.author: 柚子呦
replies.txt_content:
推荐配合RPGshop
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php? ... B61%5D%5Btype%5D%3D
简单易上手 功能强大 比shopkeeper强很多 而且npcshopkeeper有bug

replies.author: 魔方方方啊
replies.txt_content:
https://www.mcbbs.net/thread-661035-1-1.html建议用这个插件，易懂。
输入/Shopkeepers 即可创建1个村民
然后shift+右键 即可设置兑换物品！

replies.author: pepsi小唐
replies.txt_content:
Lagguishop配合公民插件达到商店效果，配置简单易懂，支持金币或者点卷
https://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=820074

求最佳

replies.author: 南柯郡守
replies.txt_content:
